name: Team Void - Always Together
description:
Hello!

This is Kevin, Mehul, and Sung Wha! We are Team Void, and we present you our game, "Always Together"

This is a game submission for ArtCenter GameJam 2021

We hope you enjoy our game! 

- Kevin, Mehul, and Sung Wha

(Kevin Correia, Mehul Malhotra, and Sung Wha Kang are Grad Transportation Systems & Design students at ArtCenter College of Design.)
